subject: Soccer
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Barcelona teammates Lionel Messi and Xavi Hernández will be up against Real Madrid’s Cristiano Ronaldo for the FIFA world player of the year award, the Ballon d’Or.
snippet: The Barcelona teammates Lionel Messi and Xavi Hernández will be up against Real Madrid’s Cristiano Ronaldo for the FIFA world player of the year award, the Ballon d’Or.
